io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util

クラス Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util.Utilities

  • public final class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for a workpath containing event folders which have SAC files. also this contains various useful static methods.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • toTimeString

        public static java.lang.String toTimeString(long nanoSeconds)
        Change the input to an intelligible expression.
        パラメータ:
        nanoSeconds - time
        戻り値:
        ?d, ?h, ?min and ?s

      • getClipBoard

        public static java.lang.String getClipBoard()
                                     throws java.awt.datatransfer.UnsupportedFlavorException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        戻り値:
        String in the clipboard
        例外:
        java.awt.datatransfer.UnsupportedFlavorException - if the clipboard has any that can not be string.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • readInputLine

        public static java.lang.String readInputLine()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        戻り値:
        string read by standard input (System.in)
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any

      • computeAIC

        public static double computeAIC(double variance,
                                int n,
                                int k)
        独立データn, 自由度kに対してAICを計算する
        パラメータ:
        variance - variance
        n - 独立データ数
        k - 自由度
        戻り値:
        aic

      • run

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.Future<T> run(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> task)
        型パラメータ:
        T - The result type.
        パラメータ:
        task - to put in another thread
        戻り値:
        Future of the task

      • globalCMTIDSet

        public static java.util.Set<GlobalCMTID> globalCMTIDSet(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        path - Path for search of GlobalCMTID
        戻り値:
        unmodifiable Set of Global CMT IDs in the path
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • eventFolderSet

        public static java.util.Set<EventFolder> eventFolderSet(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        引数ディレクトリ内のGlobalCMTIDに準ずるイベントフォルダ群
        パラメータ:
        path - Path of a folder containing event folders.
        戻り値:
        Set of EventFolder in the workPath
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • sacFileNameSet

        public static java.util.Set<SACFileName> sacFileNameSet(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Errors in reading each event folder is just noticed. Such event folder will be ignored.
        パラメータ:
        path - of a folder containing event folders which have SAC files.
        戻り値:
        Unmodifiable Set of sac in event folders under the path
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • runEventProcess

        public static long runEventProcess(java.nio.file.Path workPath,
                                   java.util.function.Consumer<EventFolder> process,
                                   long timeout,
                                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Runs process for all event folders under the workPath
        パラメータ:
        workPath - where this looks for event folders
        process - Consumer for each event
        timeout - timeout for the process
        unit - unit of the timeout
        戻り値:
        elapsed time [nano second]
        例外:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the process takes over 30 minutes
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • moveSacfile

        public static void moveSacfile(java.nio.file.Path path,
                               java.util.function.Predicate<SACFileName> predicate)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Move SAC files that satisfies sacPredicate in event folders under the path
        パラメータ:
        path - working path
        predicate - if true with a sacfile in event folders, the file is moved to the directory.
        例外:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the process takes over 30 minutes
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getTemporaryString

        public static java.lang.String getTemporaryString()
        Create a string for temporary files or w/e
        戻り値:
        yyyyMMddHHmmss

      • toSignificantFigure

        public static double toSignificantFigure(int n,
                                         double d)
        パラメータ:
        n - the effective digit
        d - value to change
        戻り値:
        changed value which effective digit is n

      • fixDecimalPlaces

        public static java.lang.String fixDecimalPlaces(int n,
                                                double value)
        パラメータ:
        n - number of decimal places
        value - to fix
        戻り値:
        string for fixed value

      • collectSpcFileName

        public static java.util.Set<SPCFile> collectSpcFileName(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        path - Path to look for FormattedSPCFile in
        戻り値:
        set of SPCFile in the dir
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • println

        public static void println(java.lang.Object... objs)
        print all input objects using PrintStream.println()
        パラメータ:
        objs - to be printed

      • moveToDirectory

        public static void moveToDirectory(java.nio.file.Path srcPath,
                                   java.nio.file.Path destDirectory,
                                   boolean createDestDir,
                                   java.nio.file.CopyOption... options)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        srcPath - Path of the file to be moved
        destDirectory - Path of the destination directory
        createDestDir - If true create the destination directory, otherwise if false throw an IOException
        options - for copying
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • toStringWithD

        public static java.lang.String toStringWithD(int n,
                                             double d)
        Changes an input double value to a string. The value is rounded to have n decimal places.
        パラメータ:
        n - the number of decimal places (Note that if decimal is 0, this value will be ignored)
        d - to be changed
        戻り値:
        String with d expressing .

      • sendMail

        public static void sendMail(java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String... bodies)
                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                            java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.io.IOException
